import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import "./post.css"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLiked] = useState(post.like); const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(post.like); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} liked
{post.comment} comments
); }
